description:
The alliance hurries to rescue the captured Wendy, but a number of Dark Guilds are standing in their way! Somehow Natsu kicks the butts of the powerful foes in his way and reaches the place where Wendy and Happy are, but there he comes face to face with someone he could never have imagined encountering! Before him is Jellal, who was supposed to have been engulfed in Etherion and vanished at the Tower of Heaven! Jellal then leaves on his own... His appearance has turned everything willy-nilly!
Source: crunchyroll
